ai-thag2.22:1.1_0: There was a king named Panāda
ai-thag2.22:1.2_0: who had a sacrificial post all golden.
ai-thag2.22:1.3_0: Its height was sixteen times its width,
ai-thag2.22:1.4_0: and the top was a thousand-fold.
ai-thag2.22:2.1_0: It had a thousand panels and a hundred ball-caps,
ai-thag2.22:2.2_0: all adorned with banners, and made of gold.
